attributes.additional_details:
In the gut there are many strains of bacteria and yeast which are essential to health.  Due to the overuse of antibiotics and other factors many people have illnesses associated with a poor gut flora.

Illnesses such as :-

Alzheimer's Disease
Obesity
Parkinson's Disease
MS
ME
Arthritis

Whilst more research is needed there is plenty of evidence to prove that gut health is a major issue.  There is no specific test for Parkinson's, Alzheimer's or MS however there is a test for the gut flora.

Please sign this e-petition to -
•	have this test made available to all that need or request it.
•	have doctors educated to understand the gut flora and what tests and treatments that are available.
•	have gut health given a high priority within the NHS.
